textDari: سکوت بهتر از صحبت بی‌مورد است
textPashto: چپتیا له بې ځایه خبرو ښه ده
translationEn: Silence is better than unnecessary talk
meaning: Sometimes it is wiser to stay silent than to speak without purpose.

textDari: هر که بامش بیش برفش بیشتر
textPashto: څوک چې لوړه بام لري، ډیر واوره پرې راځي
translationEn: The higher the roof, the more snow it gets
meaning: Those with greater status or wealth face greater problems.

textDari: کار نیکو کردن از پر کردن است
textPashto: ښه کار کول له پیل کولو نه دی بلکې له دوام سره دی
translationEn: Doing a good job is from continuation, not just starting
meaning: Success comes from persistence, not just beginning.

textDari: از کوزه همان برون تراود که در اوست
textPashto: څه چې په لوټۍ کې وي، هغه به بهر راوځي
translationEn: What comes out of the jug is what is inside it
meaning: People show what is inside them through their actions and words.
